text: 2|159|naneun myeongbaeghan jeung-geowa indoleul naelyeossgo salamdeul-eul wihae geugeos-eul seongseoeseo bunmyeonghi seolmyeonghaess-eum-edo sillo geugeos-eul gamchuneun jadeul-i iss-euni, geuleohan jadeul-eun hananimkkeseo geudeul-eul jeojuhasimyeo jeojuhaneun jadeuldo geudeul-eul jeojuhanola
